AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: country into which Alfredo Ortega-Chavez attempted to smuggle undocumented aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Mexico: country where Alfredo Ortega-Chavez previously ventured to smuggle undocumented aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Nuevo Laredo: city where permit was obtained and smuggling operation proceeded, also a point of re-entry for the van with hidden compartment
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Sabinas Hidalgo: location where witnesses saw Alfredo Ortega-Chavez on November 21 and 22, 1980, and where meeting with undocumented aliens took place, also location where Ramon Gonzalez Sanchez's parents claimed to have seen Alfredo Ortega-Chavez, and where Alfredo Ortega-Chavez was on November 22, 1980
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.a restaurant in Sabinas Hidalgo: location of meeting between smugglers and undocumented aliens before proceeding to Nuevo Laredo
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.San Antonio, Texas: location where Graciela Castaneda and her husband had brunch with Alfredo Ortega-Chavez on November 22, 1980, also location relevant to Graciela Castaneda's testimony, and location where Alfredo Ortega-Chavez had been on the day in question
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo: location where a juror's friend, another female lawyer, is from, mentioned during voir dire of the jury panel
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.courtroom: location where trial of Alfredo Ortega-Chavez took place, conducted fairly and impartially by Judge Kazen, with thorough examination of the entire record and proceedings
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.a bus from Sabinas Hidalgo to Nuevo Lare: transport used by smugglers and undocumented aliens from Sabinas Hidalgo to Nuevo Laredo
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.a taxi from Nuevo Laredo bus terminal to: transport used by undocumented aliens from the Nuevo Laredo bus terminal to a point close to the bridge leading into the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the bridge: location where Customs officer inspected the van and discovered hidden compartment with undocumented aliens, also point of attempted re-entry into the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the van: vehicle used for smuggling operation, containing hidden compartment
